title: Equipment for measuring and pouring leguminous products
title_uz: Dukkakli mahsulotlarni o’lchash va quyib berish uskunasi
title_ru: Оборудование для дозирования и розлива зернобобовых продуктов
title_en: Equipment for measuring and pouring leguminous products
short_description:
Measuring and pouring machine for leguminous products from 250 grams to 500 grams.

The products are different: almonds, pistachios, crackers, tea, sugar, salt, cereals, raisins, peas, oil, beans, corn, popcorn and other products.

Technical indicators of the equipment:

  • 1. Packing weight: from 250 grams to 500 grams.
  • 2. Production capacity: 35 times/minute.
  • 3. Power: 1.5 kw/h.
  • 4. Voltage: 220 V/50 Hz.
  • 5. Equipment weight: 100 kg.
short_description_uz:
250 gramm dan 500 gramm gacha dukkakli mahsulotlarni o’lchash va quyub berish uskunasi.

Mahsulotlar turli: bodom, pista, suxarik, choy, shakar, tuz, don mahsulotlari, mayiz, no'xat, yog', loviya, kukuruz, popcorn va boshqa mahsulotlar.

Uskunaning texnik ko’rsatgichlari:

  • 1. Quyish og’irligi: 250 gramm dan 500 gramm gacha.
  • 2. Ishlab chiqarish quvvati: 35 marta/minut.
  • 3. Quvvati: 400 kw/soat.
  • 4. Kuchlanish: 220 V/50 hz.
  • 5. Uskuna og’irligi: 100 kg.
short_description_ru:
Дозировочная машина для зернобобовых продуктов от 250 грамм до 500 грамм.

Продукты разные: миндаль, фисташки, сухарики, чай, сахар, соль, крупы, изюм, горох, масло, фасоль, кукуруза, попкорн и другие продукты.

Технические показатели оборудования:

  • 1. Вес упаковки: от 250 грамм до 500 грамм.
  • 2. Производительность: 35 раз/мин.
  • 3. Мощность: 1,5 кВт/ч.
  • 4. Напряжение: 220 В/50 Гц.
  • 5. Вес снаряжения: 100 кг.
short_description_en:
Measuring and pouring machine for leguminous products from 250 grams to 500 grams.

The products are different: almonds, pistachios, crackers, tea, sugar, salt, cereals, raisins, peas, oil, beans, corn, popcorn and other products.

Technical indicators of the equipment:

  • 1. Packing weight: from 250 grams to 500 grams.

long_description:
Measuring and pouring machine for leguminous products from 250 grams to 500 grams.

The products are different: almonds, pistachios, crackers, tea, sugar, salt, cereals, raisins, peas, oil, beans, corn, popcorn and other products.

Technical indicators of the equipment:

  • 1. Packing weight: from 250 grams to 500 grams.
  • 2. Production capacity: 35 times/minute.
  • 3. Power: 1.5 kw/h.
  • 4. Voltage: 220 V/50 Hz.
  • 5. Equipment weight: 100 kg.
  • 6. Equipment size: 450x650x1600 mm.
  • 7. Hardware mechanism: mechanical engine.
  • 8. Measuring accuracy: ± 1%.
  • 9. Country of manufacture: China.
long_description_uz:
250 gramm dan 500 gramm gacha dukkakli mahsulotlarni o’lchash va quyub berish mashinasi.

Mahsulotlar turli: bodom, pista, suxarik, choy, shakar, tuz, don mahsulotlari, mayiz, no'xat, yog', loviya, kukuruz, popcorn va boshqa mahsulotlar.

Uskunaning texnik ko’rsatgichlari:

  • 1. O’lchash va quyub berish og’irligi: 250 gramm dan 500 gramm gacha.
  • 2. Ishlab chiqarish quvvati: 35 marta/minut.
  • 3. Quvvati: 1.5 kw/soat.
  • 4. Kuchlanish: 220 V/50 hz.
  • 5. Uskuna og’irligi: 100 kg.
  • 6. Uskuna o’lchami: 450x650x1600 mm.
  • 7. Uskuna mexanizmi: mexanik motor.
  • 8. O'lchash aniqligi: ± 1%.
  • 9. Ishlab chiqarilgan davlat: Xitoy.

Продукты разные: миндаль, фисташки, сухарики, чай, сахар, соль, крупы, изюм, горох, масло, фасоль, кукуруза, попкорн и другие продукты.
